attributes.action: Give NHS employee's a fair pay rise this year, not a pay cut.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is proposing a 1.5% payrise for NHS staff for the coming financial Year. This is not a pay rise, but a pay cut as the Retail Price Index is at 4.4%. NHS work extremly hard and don't deserve this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
